testcase.name: connectToDB

failure.message: The TCP/IP connection to the host testsites-rds.cyjzqj3uozc1.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com,21433, port 1433 has failed. Error: "testsites-rds.cyjzqj3uozc1.eu-west-1.rds.amazonaws.com,21433. Verify the connection properties. Make sure that an instance of SQL Server is running on the host and accepting TCP/IP connections at the port. Make sure that TCP connections to the port are not blocked by a firewall.".
